=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Buy Tejas Networks; target of Rs 1100: Emkay Global Financial
Source: Moneycontrol - News
Published: 2024-04-23 08:06
Related Stocks: RELIANCE
Categories: general

Summary:
Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Tejas Networks has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1100 in its research report dated April 23, 2024.

Sentiment: positive
